entry.content:
Yeqing Zhang (张叶青)

Associate Professor of Finance, National Academy of Financial and Economic Strategy,
Central University of Finance and Economics (CUFE)

Email: yeqingzhang@cufe.edu.cn

Download CV

About

Welcome to my website!

I am an Associate Professor of Finance at the Central University of Finance and Economics.
I received my Ph.D. in Finance from Tsinghua University in 2021, and my B.A. in Financial Engineering from CUFE in 2015.

Research Interests

  • Labor and Finance, Corporate Finance, AI and Big Data

Education

  • Ph.D. in Finance, Tsinghua University, 2021
  • B.A. in Financial Engineering, Central University of Finance and Economics, 2015

TeX公式

内联的TeX公式使用一个美元符号标记。

会被编译成
内联（行内）公式：$\Gamma(n) = (n-1)!\quad\forall n\in\mathbb N$

TeX公式块用独占一行的两个美元符号来标记。

会被编译成

$$\left \lbrace \sum_{i=0}^n i^3 = \frac{(n^2+n)(n+6)}{9} \right \rbrace$$

一段解题演示:

  1. $\because f(x)$的定义域为$(0,+\infty)$，$f{^{\prime}}(x)=\dfrac{1-a-ln x}{x^2}$，$ \therefore f{^{\prime}}(\mathrm{e})=-\dfrac{a}{e^2}$，由已知可得$f{^{\prime}}(\mathrm{e})\times 2=-1$，即$a=\dfrac{\mathrm{e}^2}{2}$

  2. 当 $x>0$ 时$g(x)\geq f(x)$，即：$$\mathrm{e}^x+\dfrac{2}{x}-1\geq\dfrac{\ln x+a}{x}$$ 化简可得：$a\le x\left(\mathrm{e}^x-1\right)-\ln x+2$
